# findage

Get age from DOB.

[![npm (scoped)](https://img.shields.io/badge/findage-1.0.0-blue.svg)](https://www.npmjs.com/package/findage)

## Install

```
$ npm install findage --save
```

## Usage

```js
const getAge = require("findage");;

getAge("1993/10/04");		// 25
getAge("1993-10-04");		// 25
getAge("1993-10-4");		// 25
```
